news_header: Kim Sae-ron's suicide highlights pressures in South Korea's entertainment industry, raising concerns over cyberbullying and mental health.
news_original_title: 'Real life Squid Game': Star's death exposes Korea's celebrity culture
news_text: Actress Kim Sae-ron's apparent suicide has reignited criticism of South Korea's entertainment industry, known for its intense pressure and scrutiny on stars. Despite rising global popularity, the industry faces backlash over cyberbullying and mental health issues, with experts doubting meaningful change will follow her tragic death.
